alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Beaches; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued April 24 at 4:02AM PDT until April 24 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Elevated surf of 5 to 8 feet with dangerous rip currents will continue today. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Beaches and Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...There is an increased risk of drowning due to the hazardous conditions. Rip currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Waves can wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats nearshore.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water due to hazardous swimming conditions, or stay near occupied lifeguard towers. Stay off rock jetties, since can be deadly locations in such conditions.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Beaches; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches
